comments:
Create a new shared launch configuration.
Shutdown eclipse
Modify the .launch externally. (common if using different platforms or 
external CM tools.)
Launch eclipse and select Run...
The modified config DOES NOT appear and get the error below
Refresh doesn't help at this point. (would help if did _before_ selecting 
Run..)
The only workaround is to close/open project
Same thing happens with 3.0M6

Likely need to adjust our resource change listener to include refresh events.

This already works in the latest 3.0 stream. After I refresh the resource or 
its container, it appears in the Launch dialog again.
